mapper.select: select * from pftable where pid=#{pid} and yid=#{yid} or pid=#{yid} and yid=#{pid}
select * from pftable where pid=#{pid} and fbool=0
select * from pftable where yid=#{yid} and fbool=0
select count(pid) from pftable where yid=#{yid} and fbool=0
mapper.update: update pftable set fbool=1 where pid=#{pid} and yid=#{yid}
